text: Tarihi tumhi svajananci hatya keli ani apalya eka samuhala desabahera ghalavile ani aparadha va dvesa karanyacya kamata tyancyavirud'dha dusaryaci baju dharali. Matra jevha te kaidi banuna tumacyajavala ale tevha tumhi tyancya mobadalyata dhana dile (jyala phidiya mhanatata) parantu tyanna desabahera ghalavine je tumacyavara harama hote (tyaci kahica kalaji ghetali nahi) kaya tumhi granthatalya kahi gostinna man'ya karata ani kahi gostinna nakarata? Tumacyapaiki jo koni ase karila, tyaci siksa yakherija kaya asavi ki ya jagata apamana ani kayamaticya divasi bhayankara siksa- yatananca mara! Ani allaha tumacya karmampasuna gaphila nahi
